long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QPocket is QuarkChain official wallet which is the first multi-shard wallet. It comes in three versions (Chrome Wallet Extension/iOS/Android), and you're looking at the Chrome Wallet Extension version.

Main features:
1. Create and import QKC wallet
2. Send and receive QKC token, support both mainnet and devnet.
3. Support all native token and QRC20 tokens on QuarkChain. 

Official website link(iOS/Android download link): 
https://www.qpocket.io
